summary: In Woody Allen's directorial debut, he took the Japanese action film Kokusai himitsu keisatsu: Kagi no kagi (1965) and re-dubbed it, changing the plot to make it revolve around a secret egg salad recipe.
cast: Woody Allen|The Lovin' Spoonful|Frank Buxton|Louise Lasser|Julie Bennett|Len Maxwell|Mickey Rose|Bryna Wilson|Tatsuya Mihashi|Mie Hama|Akiko Wakabayashi|Hideyo Amamoto|Steve Boone|Joe Butler|Susumu Kurobe|China Lee|Kumi Mizuno|Tadao Nakamaru|Tetsu Nakamura|Sachio Sakai|John Sebastian|Zal Yanovsky|Osman Yusuf
title: What's Up, Tiger Lily?
